articles.title: Apple Has Developed LOFIC Camera Sensor With 20‑Stop Dynamic Range That Could Rival High‑End Cinema Cameras And Potentially Reduce Reliance On Sony In Future iPhones - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple is reportedly testing a LOFIC camera sensor prototype with 20‑stop dynamic range, potentially rivaling cinema cameras for iPhone.
articles.content: A recent leak from a reputable Weibo source claims that Apple has already moved beyond the patent stage for its new camera sensor and could have a working prototype in internal testing. The sensor, s… [+2657 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop - Ars Technica
articles.description: Vaccination rates fell once again as nonmedical exemptions hit a new high.
